_sText:
======================================

     - de_iraqhistan - 
 
  Counter-Strike: Source Map
        bomb defuse

======================================

Author: Kampy

Email: Kampy20@gmx.de

website: www.kampys-stuff.de


=======================================
LEVEL DESCRIPTION: 

Large/open desert/mountain map with an Arabian village, 
a US military base and a terrorist camp.

This map is a tribute to "C&C Generals - Zero Hour". 
It is a remake of a our favorite Zero Hour map. All the
buildings and vehicles are supposed to look like the 
ones from the strategy game. 

===================================================================
HINTS:

- bombspot A is the Chinese Supplycenter 
- bombspot B is the American Supplycenter 
- GLA (T) team can call an Anthrax Bomber (use phone at Tspawn)
- USA (CT) team can call an Aurora Bomber (use computer at CT spawn)
- Bombers can be used only once
- Tank and Firebase-Artillery can be fired (infinitely)
- BlackLotus picture in the Chinese Bunker slowly heals you
- the Tunnelnetwork can teleport you to the other side of the map
- there are several weapons and grenades placed in the map
- there is an auto-sniper on one of the builings in the village
- if the bomb is placed at the US base the Strategy Center announces
the Hold-The-Line strategy, sandbag barricades are raised and the roof gets
accessable from the backside

-----------------

UNITS FROM CNC GENERALS:

GLA: 
Boobytrap, Barracks, SupplyStash, Armsdealer, Blackmarket, TunnelNetwork
Radarvan, Marauder Tank, Quad Cannon, Rocketbuggy, Scudlauncher, Anthrax Bomber

USA: 
Barracks, SupplyCenter, Warfactory, StrategyCenter, Firebase, Patriot
Spydrone, CrusaderTank, Humvee, Aurora Bomber

China: 
Bunker, SupplyCenter, SupplyTruck, Dozer, Troopcrawler, Listening Outpost


===================================================================
INSTALLATION:

The game files are:

de_iraqhistan.bsp
de_iraqhistan.nav

Place both files in your cstrike\maps folder, typically:

C:\Program files\Steam\SteamApps\<steam account>counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\

=======================================================
COPYRIGHT STUFF

de_iraqhistan.bsp copyright 2011 by Kampy.

You MUST NOT distribute this level unless you include this text file WITH
NO MODIFICATIONS. Please include the .res file as well so the text description
file and nav file will propagate properly during map downloads.

You are NOT authorized to disassemble and use any portion of this map.

Please feel free to email me with any comments and thank you for taking the time
to read this and for playing on this map.

Enjoy and have a very safe and productive day!

Kampy*
